channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-9918] Spark branch build is failing due to unknown url [Spark Branch]
item.description:
Spark branch is failing due to an URL that does not exist anymore. This is URL contains all spark jars used to build.

The spark jars versions are not on the official maven repository.
item.summary: Spark branch build is failing due to unknown url [Spark Branch]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Should this apply to spark branch? trunk is still using 1.2.0..
Reattaching the same patch for spark branch.

I manually kicked off the build. Now the build is completed:
http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build/780/console

Test result shouldn't matter for this patch. Thus, I'm going to commit this patch to unblock other patches.

Overall: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12703788/HIVE-9918.1-spark.patch

Test results: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build/780/testReport
Console output: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build/780/console
Test logs: http://ec2-50-18-27-0.us-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build-780/

Messages:

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12703788 - PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build

Please ignore the failure. I think committing the patch while the test was running might have caused this. However, other builds seem passing. From http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build/781/consoleFull:
